data.name: Template
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    <setBody>
        {{#if (eq format "json")}}
            <simple trim="false"><![CDATA[{{safe code_json}}]]></simple>
        {{/if}}
        {{#if (eq format "xml")}}
            <simple trim="false"><![CDATA[{{safe code_xml}}]]></simple>
        {{/if}}
    </setBody>
    <multicast>
        {{#each target}}
        <to uri="direct:{{this}}"/>
        {{/each}}
    </multicast>
</route>
